lyrics.text:
Pea ke mau tupu hake,
‘I he ‘Afiona;
‘I he me’a kotoa pē,
Ko ho finangalo:

Ke ‘oua ke mau lava’i,
‘I he ‘Afiona;
Ke mau ‘ata’atāina,
Pea haohaoa.

Pea ka hokosi lelei,
‘A e fu’u ngāue ni,
Ke ō hake ki hēvani,
Homau laumālie.

Ke mau ma’u homau tofi’a
Mo e kakai ma’a,
‘O taau mo e kau polo’i,
Ki he ‘Afiona.
